name: My first opensource mini game in React!
name_original: My first opensource mini game in React!
description:
I'm very glad to have published my first opensource mini game in React! The package is available as npm and there is a live demo also (Desktop & mobile ready!).

Thanks to this experience I was able to deepen and refine my skills.

Have you tried it? Did you find any bug? 😂 Let me know your thoughts!

Link: https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-card-memory-game

Also, you can follow me on my Instagram personal blog where I share software related content and music.

Happy coding everyone! 👨‍💻
